@graph.caption: This daal has whole green mung bean and Black eyed Peas. When cooked together, the mung bean gets mushy and makes for a thick gravy.

@graph.name: Black Eyed Pea and Mung Bean Stew. Mixed Dal. Vegan Glutenfree Recipe - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: Black eyed Pea Bean Soup. Mixed Dal with green mung beans and Lobhia. Vegan Gluten-free Soy-free Recipe

itemListElement.name: Black Eyed Pea and Mung Bean Stew. Mixed Dal. Vegan Glutenfree Recipe

@graph.name: Black Eyed Pea and Mung Bean Stew. Mixed Dal. Vegan Glutenfree Recipe
@graph.description: Black eyed Pea Bean Soup. Mixed Dal with green mung beans and Lobhia. Vegan Gluten-free Soy-free Recipe
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup dry Mung bean (green mung/moong bean)
1/2 cup dry black eyed peas/cow peas
2 teaspoons organic canola or coconut oil
1/2 teaspoon kashmiri garam masala (or use regular garam masala)
1  dried red chili ( or 1/2 teaspoon chili flakes)

recipeInstructions.text: Soak the black eyed peas and mung beans overnight or atleast 6 hours.
recipeInstructions.name: Soak the black eyed peas and mung beans overnight or atleast 6 hours.

recipeInstructions.text: Drain and rinse and keep ready.
recipeInstructions.name: Drain and rinse and keep ready.

recipeInstructions.text: In a pressure cooker or a deep pan, add oil and heat on medium.
recipeInstructions.name: In a pressure cooker or a deep pan, add oil and heat on medium.

recipeInstructions.text: Add cumin seeds, bay leaf and one dried red chili and mix for a few seconds.
recipeInstructions.name: Add cumin seeds, bay leaf and one dried red chili and mix for a few seconds.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the ginger, garlic and onion and saute for 4-5 minutes or until onion is translucent.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the ginger, garlic and onion and saute for 4-5 minutes or until onion is translucent.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in all the spices and mix for a few seconds.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in all the spices and mix for a few seconds.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the celery and tomato and cook for 4-5 minutes until tender.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the celery and tomato and cook for 4-5 minutes until tender.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the rinsed beans, salt and water.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the rinsed beans, salt and water.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix and pressure cook on low-medium for 6-7 whistles.- 20 minutes
recipeInstructions.name: Mix and pressure cook on low-medium for 6-7 whistles.- 20 minutes

recipeInstructions.text: If making in a pan, add rinsed beans, 3 cups of water, salt, cover and cook for about an hour or until the mung beans are very squishy. Cover partially with a lid.
recipeInstructions.name: If making in a pan, add rinsed beans, 3 cups of water, salt, cover and cook for about an hour or until the mung beans are very squishy. Cover partially with a lid.

recipeInstructions.text: Taste for salt and spice. Add more garam masala if needed. Add more water if needed(depends on the method of cooking, the beans and your preference of the consistency)
recipeInstructions.name: Taste for salt and spice. Add more garam masala if needed. Add more water if needed(depends on the method of cooking, the beans and your preference of the consistency)

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot topped with fresh cilantro or seasoning of choice.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve hot topped with fresh cilantro or seasoning of choice.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve with flatbread(Rotis, Naan, Pita) or Rice.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve with flatbread(Rotis, Naan, Pita) or Rice.
